column4: hey all, i am having trouble with a computer that is freezing up. When it happens, the mouse will move, but keyboard and mouse click are dead.
*buntu version? Any odd hardware?  What were you doing at the time?
it is a dell desktop computer Ubuntu 9.10  and what i am doing at the time of freeze is random.  sometimes even when i am logging in
so your cursor moves, but no mouse or keyboard events are getting through? Hmm... which brand of video card do you have?
